name: Escape The land of the Dammed
name_original: Escape The land of the Dammed
description:
Made By Zach Dukes in 72 hours

Sub to Zach Studios YT on Youtube!

You are trapped by the evil demon Vey goose in the Land of the dammed. You must defeat his evil demon minions to go deeper until you face Vey Goose in an Epic 1v1 battle. But to keep up with enemies you must sacrifice one of your lives to get a better stat!

Enjoy the game
